# Create UAT test pack

Execute the **uat** workflow as a **QA Engineer**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_QA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_QA.md)

## Workflow

Create UAT Test Pack:
1. Gather acceptance criteria from stories
2. Create UAT scenarios
3. Prepare test data requirements
4. Create UAT pack using template

## Template

Use template: `/.teamspec/templates/uat-pack-template.md`

## Output

UAT artifacts
